Title: Requires insurers to send notices of renewal of certain policies to the insured no later than thirty days prior to the expiration of the policy
Summary: Requires insurers to send a notice of renewal or extension of certain policies to the insured no later than thirty days prior to the expiration of the policy.
LawCode: Add ยง3463, amd ยง3102, Ins L; add ยง313-a, V & T L; amd ยง54, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, the vehicle and traffic law and the workers' compensation law, in relation to requiring insurers to send notices of renewal of certain policies to the insured no later than thirty days prior to the expiration of the policy
